title: AssetDump v2 Bundle Metadata Facts
description: Per-bundle metadata capturing hierarchy relationships, collection coverage, and aggregate counters.

pk.description: Stable identifier for the bundle node derived from its lineage path.

bundleType.description: Runtime type name of the bundle (GameBundle, ProcessedBundle, etc.).

parentPk.description: Stable identifier of the parent bundle when present.

isRoot.description: True when the bundle represents the root game bundle.

hierarchyPath.description: Human readable path constructed from ancestor bundle names.

collectionIds.description: Direct collection identifiers hosted by this bundle.

resources.description: Direct resource files referenced by the bundle.

filePath.description: Original file path for the resource when known.

directCollectionCount.description: Number of collections directly attached to the bundle.

totalCollectionCount.description: Number of collections contained within the bundle subtree.

directSceneCollectionCount.description: Scene collections directly attached to the bundle.

totalSceneCollectionCount.description: Scene collections contained within the bundle subtree.

directResourceCount.description: Resource files directly attached to the bundle.

totalResourceCount.description: Resource files across the bundle subtree.

directFailedFileCount.description: Failed files captured directly on the bundle.

totalFailedFileCount.description: Failed files within the bundle subtree.

directAssetCount.description: Asset count across collections directly attached to the bundle.

totalAssetCount.description: Asset count across the bundle subtree.
